rules.natural: If the insurance company requests a condition report for the artwork, then the lending department denies travel for the artwork.
Provided that the insurance company declines a condition report for the artwork, it is not the case that the lending department approves travel for the artwork.
Whenever routine conservation is scheduled for the artwork, emergency conservation is not needed for the artwork.
The conservation department requests material analysis for the artwork, or the conservation department declines material analysis for the artwork.
In the event that the conservation department declines material analysis for the artwork, it is not the case that there is unauthorized access to the security system.
Suppose that the conservation department approves material analysis for the artwork; then there is no unauthorized access to the security system.
Given that the senior curator grants authorization for the artwork, a conservator is assigned to the conservation job for the artwork.
Either the senior curator grants authorization for the artwork, or the senior curator denies authorization for the artwork.

Should the senior curator deny authorization for the artwork, then if the conservation department requests material analysis for the artwork, the conservation department approves material analysis for the artwork.

Provided that a conservator is assigned to the conservation job for the artwork, then if the conservation department requests material analysis for the artwork, the conservation department approves material analysis for the artwork.
Either the lending department approves travel for the artwork, or there is no unauthorized access to the security system.

In cases where it is not the case that either the board of directors approves a loan for the artwork, or either the insurance company requests a condition report for the artwork or the insurance company declines a condition report for the artwork, then emergency conservation is needed for the artwork.

Assuming that it is not the case that either the board of directors approves a loan for the artwork, or either the insurance company requests a condition report for the artwork or the insurance company declines a condition report for the artwork, then routine conservation is scheduled for the artwork.
Whenever the security protocol is not active for the security system, unauthorized access to the security system occurs.
